TopicTitle: What mod turns the p fairings?

Articles.Content: Hey, i was wondering, i remember seeing a mod which allows you to change the way the atock p fairings from the popcorn to the clam shell. What was this mod? And, will it work for the other modded p fairings like in kw rocktry?
Stock Clamshell Fairings. No idea if it works with other fairings, but I doubt it.
Stock Clamshell Fairing for clamshell fairing and Stock Fairing Tweaker for editing how many divisions your fairing seperate. Yes, I believed it work for me in SpaceY and KW pFairing.
